mapper.select: SELECT N_XH, C_BT, C_NR, C_JSR, C_CSR, C_MSR, FUN_GET_MULTI_YHMC(C_JSR) C_JSR_, FUN_GET_MULTI_YHMC(C_CSR) C_CSR_, FUN_GET_MULTI_YHMC(C_MSR) C_MSR_ FROM B_NBYJ WHERE N_XH = #{n_xh}
SELECT N_XH, C_BT, TO_CHAR(D_DJ,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:MI:SS') D_DJ, FUN_GET_YHMC(C_YHID) C_YHID, C_IP FROM B_NBYJ WHERE C_ZT = #{c_zt} AND C_YHID = #{c_yhid}

SELECT B.N_XH, B.C_BT, TO_CHAR(B.D_DJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:MI:SS') D_DJ, FUN_GET_YHMC(B.C_YHID) C_YHID, B.C_IP, DECODE(R.C_ZT, '1', '未签收', '2', '已签收', '已删除') C_ZT FROM B_NBYJ B, B_NBYJ_RECIEVE R WHERE B.N_XH = R.N_NBYJXH AND R.C_JSR = #{c_yhid} AND R.C_ZT > '0'

SELECT B.N_XH, B.C_BT, TO_CHAR(B.D_DJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:MI:SS') D_DJ, FUN_GET_YHMC(B.C_YHID) C_YHID, B.C_IP, DECODE(R.C_ZT, '1', '未签收', '2', '已签收', '已删除') C_ZT FROM B_NBYJ B, B_NBYJ_RECIEVE R WHERE B.N_XH = R.N_NBYJXH AND R.C_JSR = #{c_yhid} AND R.C_ZT = '0'

SELECT N_XH, C_BT, TO_CHAR(D_DJ,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:MI:SS') D_DJ, FUN_GET_YHMC(C_YHID) C_YHID, C_IP FROM B_NBYJ B WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM B_NBYJ_RECIEVE R WHERE R.N_NBYJXH = B.N_XH AND R.C_JSR = #{c_yhid} AND R.C_ZT = '1')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_NBYJ( N_XH , C_BT , C_YHID , C_YHZID , C_NR , C_IP , C_SFSC , C_ZT , C_JSR , C_CSR , C_MSR , D_DJ ) VALUES ( seq_b_nbyj.nextval, #{c_bt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_yhzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_nr,javaType=String,jdbcType=CLOB,handler=ClobTypeHandler}, #{c_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_sfsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_csr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_msr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE B_NBYJ SET C_BT = #{c_bt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NR = #{c_nr,jdbcType=CLOB,handler=ClobTypeHandler}, C_JSR = #{c_jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_CSR = #{c_csr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MSR = #{c_msr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE N_XH = #{n_xh}
